title: Type - Stock Class Conversion Rights
description: Type representation of a conversion right from one security into a stock class

conversion_calculation_type.description: How is the resulting number of shares calculated

ratio.description: One share of this stock class converts into this many target stock class shares

rounding_type.description: How should fractional shares be rounded?

fixed_conversion_amount.description: If the security converts to a fixed amount of shares of the target Stock Class, provide the amount

converts_to_future_round.description: Is this stock class potentially convertible into a future, as-yet undetermined stock class (e.g. Founder Preferred)

converts_to_stock_class_id.description: The identifier of the existing, known stock class this stock class can convert into

custom_conversion_description.description: Detailed description of how the number of resulting shares should be determined? For use with CUSTOM conversion calculaton types.

oneOf.title: Converts to not-yet-existing and/or not-yet-known stock class
Converts to existing, known stock class
